housing_status.evidence: Agent asked: 'Do you rent or own your home?' Client confirmed they own.

housing.evidence: Agent asked: 'And what is your monthly mortgage payment?' Client said $1,412.

housing_insurance.evidence: Agent asked: 'Do you pay homeowners insurance?' Client confirmed it's included in escrow.

utilities.evidence: Agent asked: 'What do your utilities run each month?' Client said about $200.

phone_internet_tv.evidence: Agent asked: 'What about phone and internet?' Client said $150.

car_payment.evidence: Agent asked: 'Do you have a car payment?' Client confirmed $350/month.

car_insurance.evidence: Agent asked: 'And car insurance?' Client said $120/month.

car_fuel.evidence: Agent asked: 'How much do you spend on gas?' Client said about $200/month.

food_and_groceries.evidence: Agent asked: 'What about groceries?' Client said roughly $400/month.

medical.evidence: Client mentioned: 'I also have about $50 in prescriptions each month.'

health_and_life_insurance.evidence: Agent asked: 'Do you pay for health or life insurance?' Client said $300/month for health.

household.evidence: Client mentioned household supplies during broad expenses discussion.

personal_care.evidence: Personal care expenses were not discussed during the call.

student_loans.evidence: Agent asked: 'Any student loans?' Client said no.

legal.evidence: Legal expenses were not discussed during the call.

alimony_and_child_support.evidence: Agent asked: 'Any child support or alimony?' Client said no.

back_taxes.evidence: Back taxes were not discussed during the call.

dependent_care.evidence: Dependent care was not discussed during the call.

other_debts.evidence: Agent asked: 'Any other monthly debts or expenses?' Client said no.

key_evidence_quote: Agent thoroughly collected all required budget categories through direct questioning.
